main event: Multiple witnesses observed a brightly lit object emitting an orange glow, hovering and moving rapidly across the sky in Abilene, Texas.
interesting points: The object was white in color and stirred up dust and vegetation as it passed close to the witnesses., Witnesses described the object as appearing very rapidly and then hovering., The sighting lasted for approximately one minute., The report references the motion of the object as peculiar, rocking or swaying while moving quickly., Civilian witnesses submitted several reports to the U.S. Air Force regarding this sighting.
sighted object: brightly lit object with an orange glow
witness description: Civilian observers including individuals from McDonald Observatory.
